@wearebackhome @ColinG_1 @JuliaHB1 Isn't her whole point, no one should be FORCED to wear a mask at any time.That doesn't mean to say you can't wear one if you want to,she just believes in the right to chose, which means if she wants to wear one on a plane but not in the supermarket,that is her right, is it not?
American Airlines turned a flight around in order to REMOVE a mom and baby from plane because her baby wouldn’t keep a mask on. The baby suffered an asthma attack. The company was American Airlines.

@ergrtsghsrhy @Cristinellalala @yogarespecter @untappedgrowth @AmericanAir Im vax’d & only go out when necessary but I’ve still had to remove my mask in public. I’ve tried to stand away from others as much as possible before doing so, because obvs I don’t want to CATCH/CARRY anything to loved ones at risk, but on a plane particular w/my mobility...cont

@grrenshaw @BarbaraComstock So drive everywhere. You are vaccinated and wearing a mask, being on a vaxxed only plane won’t make you feel safe either because you’ve had your brain melted by fear. Vaccinated people are spread it to so no guarantee it doesn’t circulate on your plane ride lol
